title: "Airline food waste: no-meal option, AI to identify uneaten items trialled to reduce the amount that end up in the trash"
excerpt: "Airlines are tackling food waste by offering incentives to passengers who opt out of meals before they fly, and using AI to analyse consumption trends. Some, like Cathay Pacific, donate to food kitchens where laws allow it."
